title: Singapore and the UK are both planning to 'live with Covid.' They are worlds apart on how to do that
content:
1. Singapore and the UK are both planning to 'live with Covid.' They are worlds apart on how to do that  CNN
  2. KTV COVID-19 CLUSTER: Most of the cases visited multiple KTV clubs, outlets  CNA
  3. Singapore announces separate Covid rules for people who are vaccinated  CNBC
  4. Forum: Visitors to KTV lounges should pay for their Covid-19 tests  The Straits Times
  5. Forum: Plug these loopholes in the wake of KTV cluster  The Straits Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: シンガポールとイギリスは、ともに「Covidとの共存」を計画しています。その方法については、両者ともに隔たりがあります
新加坡和英国都在计划 "与Covid一起生活"。他们在如何做到这一点上有着天壤之别
新加坡和英國都在計劃 "與Covid一起生活"。他們在如何做到這一點上有着天壤之別
